name: Mary Lynne HEALY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION
name_abbreviation: Healy v. Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: Mary Lynne HEALY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joseph A. Fricker, Jr., Fricker & Associates, Poughkeepsie, Steven Leindecker, Grogan, Graffam, McGinley & Lucchino, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellant at No. 85.
Charles R. Volk, Jane Lewis Volk, Volk, Frankovitch, Anetakis, Recht, Robertson & Hellerstedt, Poughkeepsie, for North American Corp.
Vincent A. Ciccone, Asst. Chief Counsel, Diane Blancet-Maddock, Asst. Chief Counsel, Pittsburgh, for Pennsylvania Human Relations Com’n.
casebody.head_matter:
613 A.2d 1207
Mary Lynne HEALY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 22, 1992.
Decided Oct. 14, 1992.
Reargument Denied Jan. 4, 1993.
Joseph A. Fricker, Jr., Fricker & Associates, Poughkeepsie, Steven Leindecker, Grogan, Graffam, McGinley & Lucchino, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellant at No. 85.
Charles R. Volk, Jane Lewis Volk, Volk, Frankovitch, Anetakis, Recht, Robertson & Hellerstedt, Poughkeepsie, for North American Corp.
